name: May Residences - Watermark
address: WaterMark Tay Ho, 395 Lac Long Quan,, Tay Ho District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located just steps from West Lake in Hanoi, each air-conditioned apartment features private balcony offering views of the city and West Lake.

Each apartment has a seating area, cable flat-screen TV and personal safe. A kitchen is equipped with a stovetop, microwave, refrigerator and dining area. A private laundry room is fitted with a washing machine. En suite bathroom comes with a bathtub, shower facilities and a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in this self-catering accommodation.

Guests have access to the fitness centre and outdoor pool at this self-catering accommodation. 24-hour front desk and security are available.

Guests can make their own breakfast with egg, jam, butter, and fresh bread provided. Instant noodles, tea and coffee are also available.

Phu Tay Ho is 1.2 km from Lake View Apartment, while Tran Quoc Pagoda is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 18 km from Lake View Apartment.
